 2013-08022013-06-12,  PS,  ,  , 
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectOrder No. 159 - (Nova Scotia) Provincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 159 which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of NOVA SCOTIA with respect to the RAINSTORM which affected the province from September 9 to 11, 2012, inclusive.
AttachmentsAttachment
